Package org.ldaptive.auth

Class FormatDnResolver

java.lang.Object
org.ldaptive.AbstractFreezable
org.ldaptive.auth.FormatDnResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
DnResolver, Freezable
public class FormatDnResolver extends AbstractFreezable implements DnResolver
Returns a DN by applying a formatter. See Formatter.
